message: Let's split it evenly, it's a fair start!
I'll take the lead, you can follow!
I'm willing to compromise, but I want a slightly better deal this time!
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy!
I'm still willing to compromise, but I need a better deal to make it worth my while!
I'm taking control, you're running out of time!
I'm making a last-ditch effort to find a fair deal, let's see if you'll meet me halfway!
You're running out of time, I'm taking the lion's share!
I'm making a final plea, let's try to find a deal that's not completely one-sided!
You're out of options, I'm taking what's left!
I'm out of options, I'll take nothing and walk away
